message.content:
The most likely category for this paper would be "Books" (5) since it mentions Stephen King as the author and provides information about his books. 

The second likely category would be "Movies & TV" (14) as it mentions Stephen King's works being adapted into movies and TV shows. 

The third likely category would be "CDs & Vinyl" (8) as it mentions John Mellencamp, who is a musician, and his involvement in the project. 

The fourth likely category would be "Magazine Subscriptions" (23) as it mentions a program booklet, which could be associated with a magazine or publication. 

The fifth likely category would be "Collectibles & Fine Art" (28) as Stephen King's books are often considered collectible items and have a dedicated fan base.

prompt:
Title: Ghost Brothers of Darkland County - Program Booklet
Content: STEPHEN KING is the author of more than sixty books, all of them worldwide bestsellers. Among his most recent are the Dark Tower novels, Under the Dome, 11-22-63, and Just After Sunset. His acclaimed nonfiction book, On Writing, was also a bestseller. He is the recipient of the 2003 National Book Foundation Medal for Distinguished Contribution to American Letters. He lives in Bangor, Maine, with his wife, novelist Tabitha King. JOHN MELLENCAMP is the all-American small-town boy grown-up and his...
